00040 typedef void (*FreeArc)(struct BArc*);
00041 typedef void (*FreeNode)(struct BNode*);

00047  * RigGraph, ReebGraph
00048  * 
00049  * */

00051 typedef struct BGraph {
00052     ListBase    arcs;
00053     ListBase    nodes;
00054     
00055     float length;
00056     
00057     /* function pointer to deal with custom fonctionnality */
00058     FreeArc         free_arc;
00059     FreeNode        free_node;
00060     RadialSymmetry  radial_symmetry;
00061     AxialSymmetry   axial_symmetry;
00062 } BGraph;
00063 
00064 typedef struct BNode {
00065     void *next, *prev;
00066     float p[3];
00067     int flag;
00068 
00069     int degree;
00070     struct BArc **arcs;
00071     
00072     int subgraph_index;
00073 
00074     int symmetry_level;
00075     int symmetry_flag;
00076     float symmetry_axis[3];
00077 } BNode;
00078 
00079 typedef struct BArc {
00080     void *next, *prev;
00081     struct BNode *head, *tail;
00082     int flag;
00083 
00084     float length;
00085 
00086     int symmetry_level;
00087     int symmetry_group;
00088     int symmetry_flag;
00089 } BArc;

00101 typedef void* (*HeadFct)(void* iter);

00103 typedef void* (*PeekFct)(void* iter, int n);
00104 typedef void* (*NextFct)(void* iter);
00105 typedef void* (*NextNFct)(void* iter, int n);
00106 typedef void* (*PreviousFct)(void* iter);
00107 typedef int   (*StoppedFct)(void* iter);
00108 
00109 typedef struct BArcIterator {
00110     HeadFct     head;
00111     TailFct     tail;
00112     PeekFct     peek;
00113     NextFct     next;
00114     NextNFct    nextN;
00115     PreviousFct previous;
00116     StoppedFct  stopped;
00117     
00118     float *p, *no;
00119     float size;
00120     
00121     int length;
00122     int index;
00123 } BArcIterator;

00125 /* Helper structure for radial symmetry */
00126 typedef struct RadialArc
00127 {
00128     struct BArc *arc; 
00129     float n[3]; /* normalized vector joining the nodes of the arc */
00130 } RadialArc;

00170 /* BNode symmetry flags */
00171 #define SYM_TOPOLOGICAL 1
00172 #define SYM_PHYSICAL    2
00173 
00174 /* the following two are exclusive */
00175 #define SYM_AXIAL       4
00176 #define SYM_RADIAL      8
00177 
00178 /* BArc symmetry flags
00179  * 
00180  * axial symmetry sides */
00181 #define SYM_SIDE_POSITIVE       1
00182 #define SYM_SIDE_NEGATIVE       2
00183 /* Anything higher is the order in radial symmetry */
00184 #define SYM_SIDE_RADIAL         3
